info.name: Youtube Neon v1
info.description:
A style for those who like neon and gradients in everything. Almost black background and lighter sidebar with text using gradients. The code has been commented in case you want personal changes.Second version on:
https://userstyles.org/styles/210377/youtube-neon-v2
and the Third on:
https://userstyles.org/styles/211704/youtube-neon-v3
PS: my bst the ever with a handfull of customization is here and work using Stylus: https://userstyles.world/style/5256/youtube-personalization-color-neon-handull-of-options
